scripts.test-older: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:8085 -r ts-node/register -r jsdom-global/register -r unitTestSetup.ts test/**/*.ts src/*.test.tsx src/**/*.test.tsx --recursive --require ignore-styles --watch-files src,tests --watch
scripts.test-old: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' env-cmd -f .env.test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:8085 -r ts-node/register -r jsdom-global/register test/**/*.ts src/*.test.tsx src/**/*.test.tsx --recursive --require ignore-styles --watch-files src,tests --watch
scripts.test: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:8085 -r ts-node/register -r jsdom-global/register -r unitTestSetup.ts test/**/*.ts src/**/*.test.tsx --recursive --require ignore-styles --watch-files src,tests --watch
scripts.test:report: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha -r ts-node/register -r jsdom-global/register -r unitTestSetup.ts test/**/*.ts src/**/*.test.tsx --recursive --require ignore-styles --watch-files src,tests
